::Hakibuscon::

     Hakibuscon kept slithering away, peacefully.  He saw a=
 rat.  Hakibuscon snuck up and then ate it.  He hadn't tasted something lik=
e that in a while.  He liked the way that he adapted to his animal's eating=
 habits, personality, etc.  He transformed into robot mode, he saw a battle=
 of some sort.  WOW!!!!  There was some flaming bot, and a whole bunch of o=
thers, each firing at a single target.

     He watched as they all fought.=
  Then, he rubbed his head.  Hehe.  This bot's head had been crushed.  Man,=
 she sure took a beating while she was still alive.  Hakibuscon joined in t=
his little battle.  He took out.......Yes!!!!  He took out a lazer pistol!!=
!  Yes, he had weapons!!!!  He stepped up with all of them, and fired two s=
hots from his lazer pistol(At whoever they were all firing at).  Maybe he c=
ould join them for a while.
